Name: ZEROCRON
About the game: ZEROCRON is a straightforward, classical arcade Twin-Stick Shoot-Em-Up with a strong Commodore-Amiga-era feel. Blast asteroids and enemies to burning pixeldust! Developed and polished for 10 years. -99 levels with increasing difficulty -no lives, just see how far you can survive the action -automatically saves at every level for casual play -buy multiple weapons and upgrades in shop -various enemies and bosses -homemade pixel-gfx -4 difficulty settings -keyboard/mouse and joypad-support -arcade (MAME) compatible controlmode No Bullet Hell, no RPG, no roguelike, no fancy twists ;)
